Html:
I created new pager size with name is 'dotPrinter'.

If i count number of pagersize type in printer server properties on my PC, then I set pagersize = number of pagersize type: 

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getPageSetup()->setPaperSize(143)

It's OK.

But, I can't do so, because i don't know other PC how many pagersize type.

Please tell me how to set special pager size with name is 'dotPrinter'.
